LSU freshman guard Tremont Waters  dribbles the ball during the Tigers  victory against Missouri on Saturday Feb PERIOD   in the PMAC PERIOD

LSU point guard Tremont Waters was named to the coaches AllFreshman SEC team for his historic season the league announced Tuesday morning PERIOD

Waters averaged . points per game and . assists in  regular season games PERIOD He also set the school record for assists by a freshman at  passing Ben Simmons who held the record in  PERIOD

Waters was second overall in assists per game in the SEC and was first overall in steals averaging two per contest PERIOD
